m_szDocSumamry: Why Did Tesla Stock Drop 10% In One Day? September 17th, 2014 by Christopher DeMorro   Elon Musk and Tesla Motors have seemingly been on a roll lately, and the latest victory for the Gigafactory was a big one, sending stock prices soaring to new heights. Then on Monday, Tesla stock lost 10% of its value in a matter of hours, falling from about $280 a share down to just above $251 a share, and for no good reason. What gives?
